content:
Where is this button and in what version. I am using the release version 128.2.3 and I don't see one jumping out at me.

Where to you see it?

DO you have any addons installed that might be putting that button in place? Perhaps try restarting Thunderbird in Troubleshooting mode from he help menu.
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
I have attached the header / button bar that appears on top of the email I received containing your reply that shows the RWH button. I am using Thunderbird version 128.2.3esr (64-bit).

I tried the Thunderbird in Troubleshooting mode and the button was gone. I started Thunderbird normally and RWH was back. I checked my Addons and I only have two and one is called "ReplyWithHeader" which abbreviated is RWH. I would need to contact the author of that Addon to find out what 10s means.

Thanks for your quick guidance.
creator: bkoopers

content:
Prova a seguire questa procedura:

  1. Fare un backup integrale del profilo -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/profili-thunderbird#w_effettuare-una-copia-di-sicurezza-del-profilo
  2. Compattare le cartelle -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/compattazione-cartelle
  3. Riavviare Thunderbird
  4. Se il problema non è risolto, ricostruire l'indice globale -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/ricostruzione-indice-globale
  5. Riavviare Thunderbird
  6. Se il problema non si è ancora risolto: click destro sulla cartella che contiene la mail illeggibile -> Proprietà -> [Ripara la cartella]
creator: @next
